string-array.name: login_cnt
string-array.item: A fast, minimalist, and secure Telegram client.
is this the correct phone number?
Are you sure you want to start over?
Two-Step Verification enabled. Your account is protected with an additional password
Since you didn\'t provide a recovery email when setting up your password, your remaining options are either to remember your password or wait 7 days until your password is reset.
This action can\'t be undone. You will lose all your Telegram chats, messages, media and files if you proceed with resetting your account.
We\'ve sent a recovery code to the recovery email:
Please enter your email to increase your account security
Please enter the code sent to your email
You can change your login email if you are logged into Telegram from another device. Otherwise, if you don\'t have access to email
, you can reset this email with an SMS code in 7 days
Due to high cost of SMS in your country, you need a Telegram Premium account to immediately reset this email via an SMS code.
Enter your name and add a profile photo
By signing up, you agree to the

string-array.name: code_type
string-array.item: A verification code was sent to you in Telegram. Check your messages on another device. The message will come from Telegram.
We sent a verification code via SMS to your phone number.
We will call you and read out a verification code. Please listen carefully.

You will receive a short incoming call. Please don’t answer it — the code will be detected automatically. If the code wasn’t detected automatically, enter the last digits of the incoming phone number.
You will receive a short incoming call. Enter the last digits of the caller’s phone number.
To continue, open the verification link we’ve sent to you. After opening the link, return to this app.
Verification is happening automatically. Please wait… No code entry is required.
Verification is happening automatically. Please wait… No code entry is required.
A verification code will be sent shortly. Please wait…
